favourite.article: Amen!!
What love!? This reminds me of the prodigal son's father who was waiting every day for his son to come back. We too have a Father who is always waiting for us to come back to Him!

This hymn is so precious. Praise Him that He is our Father and that His love is so unlimited! He has poured out everything that He is upon us. We just need to be those that just simply give our all to Him.

Thank You Lord for Your great love towards us!! It is even unlimited. There is no other like You, Lord. This is such a sweet and loving song. We can be in love with the Lord when we are right with Him! We just need to confess and we are made right with God to enjoy Him in this relationship!
A wonderfully composed music and lyrics. I really enjoyed it, and it is great for worship.

Oh what a Father we have, my brothers and sisters in Christ. Oh how blessed we are just knowing who our Father is, Whose heart is full of LOVE towards us, even if we sin we can always come back to Him, all we need to do is just to repent and He is righteous to forgive our sins. Thank You Lord that in Your loving hands we were meant...
It is my first time hearing this hymn, and it touched my inner part inside, thank You Lord for this WONDERFUL HYMN. I LOVE YOU FATHER. <3 <3 <3
What a blessing to have a Father whose heart is full of love! Father we love You, thank You for being the all-inclusive One...

Amen! Thank you for having a Father like the Lord Jesus, Who became our All in all, The King of King and the all-inclusive one in us, Whom we trust and depend on everything. Lord we appreciate everything You are to us. Lord we love You. Thank You for loving us first. Lord once again I want to concecrate myself. May Your desire be the desire of all. Amen!

It is wonderful to have a Father like this one. No one is in danger, no one can be lost except if you want it yourself: He takes care cause He knows from what we are made. I love You precious Father for the sacrifice of Jesus our Lord. You are ready to forgive and lead even if we fall. What You need is just to see us repenting. WONDERFUL!!!! I like only to please You, oh my God, my whole life.
Our God is not only our Creator but also our Father. Yes! We have a Father whose heart is full of love toward us! Amen.
This is certainly one of the sweetest songs with the just the speaking from the Lord I needed...He forgives, He loves us.

Garcias, Padre Your love is unlimited to us, and always draws us to You. When I first listen to this hymn, I felt that there's warmth deep within me. and He loved me so. I've been waiting my 25 yrs on this earth wandering yet He still looking and intercedes for me. Thank You, Father I love You!! Praise You Father.

Tenemos un Padre Con un corazón lleno de amor. ¡Cuánto El nos ama, Su amor no tiene límite! Aunque lejos esté A El siempre puedo volver. ¡Qué gran amor tiene el Padre a nos! Simplemente volver Y en Sus brazos permanecer. ¡Qué gran amor tiene el Padre a nos!
Does anyone have the Spanish translation of this song?
This is the sweetest song. I'm trying to learn it in Spanish. In any language it is awesome how very sweet our Father is. His love is so unlimited. Praise Him.
Praise the Lord we have a Father!!! I was very touched when i first heard this song. I was holding back tears from the enjoyment it brought to my heart.
Thank You Lord we had a Father. You are so wonderful and we can contact You everyday. Lord we love You.
I really like this song. It really touches me deeply. It's so wonderful that we have a Father, who always loving us till the end.
Abba Father first love us before the foundation of the world and His love is unchanging until the consummation of this world. Amen.
Oh Lord Jesus....what a Father we have. Thank You Lord for Your love and compassion over us.
Praise the Lord for His love!
No matter where we are or how far we run we can not escape His love for us!
His love is soo UNLIMITED! This song always makes me to realise that Gods love is unchanging , so real and concrete. We have a Father!
